info.name: ZeresPluginLibrary
info.description: Gives other plugins utility functions and the ability to emulate v2.

changelog.title: Improvements
items: Added module grabbing via string(s) in WebpackModules.
Added additional DOMTool functions. (escapeHTML, onMount, etc.)

changelog.title: Bugs Squashed
items: Fixed too many logs from ReactComponents.
Fixed JSON stringify issues with string formatters.
